ENDMETHOD. "bi_object~release METHOD bi_persistent~find_by_lpor. MESSAGE lx_catched TYPE c_msgty_s DISPLAY LIKE lx_catched->mv_msgty. ENDTRY. ENDMETHOD. "bi_persistent~find_by_lpor METHOD bi_persistent~lpor. "-----------------------------------------------------------------* " Return instance key "-----------------------------------------------------------------* result = ms_lpor. ENDMETHOD. "-----------------------------------------------------------------* " Refresh instance "-----------------------------------------------------------------* * TRY. * check_existence( m%Key_field_name_Answer_with_V_KEY_or_S_KEY% ). * * CATCH zcx_ca_error INTO DATA(lx_catched). * "As long as no exceptions are declared for this method, this is * "currently the best solution. * MESSAGE lx_catched TYPE c_msgty_s DISPLAY LIKE lx_catched->mv_msgty. * ENDTRY. ENDMETHOD. "bi_persistent~refresh ENDCLASS. "%Name_of_the_class_just_created% IMPLEMENTATION
